testsuite.name: BrewdogBeerTests.BasicTests

testcase.name: Verify error message in case with not existing beer ID
Verify if each of beer has a valid name value
Verify error message in case with provided invalid beer ID
Verify if each of beer has a valid ABV value

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: ABV value is less than 4.0. Actual value: 3.2 Expected: is <true> but: was <false>
